a bush or plant from the verbena family, with small colourful flowers growing in groups on its stems: Fill the gaps with smaller plants such as lantanas grown from seed or cuttings. Eight million Australian acres are covered with invasive lantana.
More examplesFewer examplesYellow lantana flowers turn red once they are pollinated.Front yards are dotted with golden yellow lantana, red yuccas and birds of paradise.Lantana will spring up wherever the sun reaches the forest floor.
